originalText.text: My son is a student here and I have to say it earns its 5 stars. The teachers are amazing, informative and loving. They always communicate and are transparent about everything. I was nervous at first letting my son go but they have made us feel very comfortable He loves it and has made many new friends. Everyone is very welcoming.I love the safety measures they have in place and feel super safe with my son being here. If you are looking for quality care with a safe and fun environment, then this is the place for you. Easily the best child care facility in town.

My daughter goes to Big Thinkers Little Hands and I have seen SO MUCH improvement in her development. For a two year old, sheâ€™s already saying full sentences and her vocabulary has increased a lot. I love that Ms. Rosa is an experienced child educator/therapist with over 10 years in the field. My little one loves going to her daycare and enjoys all the activities and interacting with the other kids. This is a great place to put your child if youâ€™re interested in looking for a day care where the provider has years of experience behind her. Itâ€™s a great place to start before they actually go to pre-school. Ms. Rosa also provides daily updates of how your child is doing, which I love!

10/10 highly recommend :)
